alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Henderson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henderson and south central Buncombe Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Hendersonville, or near Mountain Home, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Arden, Mills River, Fletcher, Mountain Home, Asheville Airport, Etowah, Fairview In Buncombe County, Horse Shoe, and Forge Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
